title: About
subTitle: Currently in Grenoble
text1: Ever since I was little, I've loved building things, whether with code or with my hands. When I encounter a problem, I want to find a solution. Today I put this desire to work for my clients by developing digital solutions that meet their needs.
text2: When I'm not coding, I'm probably exploring the Alps on skis or on foot.

tech.title: Tech
tech.text1: Currently I mainly work with WordPress or JavaScript frameworks like React or recently AstroJS, which I particularly appreciate for its DX (Developer Experience). For styling, after creating my mockups in Figma, I like using TailwindCSS for its simplicity and efficiency.
tech.text2: Before each project start, I select the technology that will most effectively meet my needs, while minimizing (as much as possible) the project's impact on our beautiful planet.
tech.siteCarbon: This site generates 0.07g of CO2 per visit.

seo.title: About・Victor Lebecq
seo.description: Fullstack developer based in Chambéry who loves bringing impactful and sustainable projects to life.
